sentences: Buss sõidab varsti siit läbi, hüppan peale ja – aidaa, olengi läinud.
Kui tema juba kellelegi peale hüppab.., siis peab see mees vedelaks lööma.
context: The word 'olengi' is an Estonian colloquial expression that appears to be a shortened or dialectal form of the phrase 'peale hüppama' meaning to jump on something or someone. It can have both literal meanings (physically jumping onto transportation) and figurative meanings (verbally attacking or criticizing someone harshly). The examples provided show its usage in contexts where someone jumps onto a bus quickly, and where it refers to verbally berating someone.
